enGB: Adds Firebolt, a ranged touch attack dealing 1d3 fire damage. By default it is learned by magus, and classes using the wizard spell list
Adds Burning Touch, a melee touch attack dealing 1d4 fire damage. By default it is learned by magus, and classes using the wizard spell list
Adds Painful Note, a ranged touch attack dealing 1d2 sonic damage. No classes learn it by default - use the proliferation settings in the core module.
Adds Dissonant Touch, a melee touch attack dealing 1d3 sonic damage. No classes learn it by default - use the proliferation settings in the core module.
Adds Lesser Corrosive Touch, a melee touch attack dealing 1d4 acid damage. By default it is learned by magus, and classes using the wizard spell list.
Adds Lesser Shocking Grasp, a melee touch attack dealing 1d4 electricity damage. By default it is learned by magus, and classes using the wizard spell list.
Adds Frosty Touch, a melee touch attack dealing 1d4 cold damage. By default it is learned by magus, and classes using the wizard spell list.
